lead_paragraph: All options remain on the table — including moving the rowing venue to a site hundreds of miles (kilometers) outside of Tokyo — after a working group set up to review costs of the 2020 Olympics met for the first time, a top IOC official said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: IOC: All Options on Table in Cost-Cutting for Tokyo Games
headline.main: IOC: All Options on Table in Cost-Cutting for Tokyo Games
